bibl.title: Objects from the Temple of Tutu.
Egyptian Religion: The Last Thousand Years. Studies Dedicated to the Memory of Jan Quaegebeur. Part II
bibl.author: HOPE, Colin A.

bibl.note: Dakhleh Oasis Project - Excavations at Ismant el-Kharab (since 1991). - I. The Temple of Tutu (Ist-IVth cent. A.D.). - II. Objects from the Temple (sculptures, small objects, shrines, pedestals). - III. Observations. - Pp. 843-844: K.A. WORP, Appendix.
